concept.title: Katalium Server - Execute Katalon Studio's scripts on Remote Machines

conbody.p: You can execute your scripts in Katalon Studio on remote machines by using Katalium Server.

li.p: Follow this user guide to set up and activate Katalium Server.
Configure the desired capabilities for a remote machine. Open Katalon Studio. Navigate to Project > Settings > Desired Capabilities > Remote > Enter required information and then click OK.

ul.li: Remote Server URL should be in the format of http://<hub-ip-address>:<port>/wd/hub. E.g.: http://192.168.37.35:45339/wd/hub.
Add properties. Currently, all desired capabilities of the Selenium Server will be supported by Katalon Studio. The value of properties is case sensitive.

li.p: In the drop-down list of the Run button, select Remote.
If you're executing Katalium Server in the Grid mode, you can view all session details. Refer to Sessions monitoring for further instructions.
